verses.text: Yo, this is James’ bro, writing to my homie Gaius—mad respect and love, fam.
Lowkey, I hope you’re thriving in every way—health, happiness, faith—leveling up fully.
Nothing hits harder than hearing your squad is walking in truth. I was hyped, seriously.
Seeing you live in the real Jesus energy? Big joy for me—pure hype.
Fam, you’re doing mad things for traveling missionaries—giving them room, helping them out. God sees that, no cap.
They’re repping Jesus, going out for the squad, no thanks needed from anyone else.
It’s good vibes to support real missionaries—they travel for the Gospel, chasing the truth, fully committed.
If you help them, you’re part of the squad doing good work—basically tagging along in their mission.
I sent a note to the squad, telling them to respect this shady dude, Diotrephes. He’s out here blocking visitors, talking big, and refusing to welcome the squad.
Not cool. Even talking trash about me to the crew—straight-up manipulative energy. Don’t follow that vibe.
Fam, don’t copy bad energy—copy good. Real love, real truth, real respect.
Demetrius? Everyone’s hyping him up for truth and vibes—he’s got receipts and respect from everyone, including us.
I would’ve told you more, but we keep it short—can’t fit everything in text.
Peace out, fam. The squad sends love, and I hope we can link up soon.
